org.yatech.jedis.collections

Class JedisMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yatech.jedis.collections.JedisCollectionBase
      • org.yatech.jedis.collections.JedisMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>

    public class JedisMap
extends JedisCollectionBase
implements java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>
    A Map implementation giving an abstraction over Redis' hash value type.

    Created on 14/05/16

      • length

        public long length()
        Get the length of the map (i.e. the number of keys).
        This is similar to size() but is preferred since redis' capacity supports long typed values
        Returns:
        the number of keys
